name: The Family You Choose
description:
When a brother and sister come home to visit, their plans to catch up are interrupted by an interesting quest. 

“I’ve played a lot of Indie Games, and this is definitely one of them!” -Honest Reviewer

“If this game came out on January 1 at 12:01 AM, it probably wouldn’t be the front runner for Game of the Year at that moment.” -Perhaps-too-honest Reviewer

“It’s all about the characters.” - Truth Speaker
